userposts.title: Cat Marries Pig
userposts.content: Guess what, you guessed right! It happened again, another cat in Sussex has married a pig of 12 years its senior!

userposts.title: Nothing new, just creative
userposts.content: An interviewee just commented that while she is extremely creative, it takes several cups of coffee and a shot of bourbon to continue. News at 11.

userposts.title: Sportsball on the rise
userposts.content: To further the explosion of sportsball, the team the 'Mad Hatters' has included dodge ball in their competitive play
